snippet: The split-screen videos show executives from the Tokyo Electric Power Company, or Tepco, huddled around a conference table, trying to grasp or organize the situation.
abstract: Recordings released by Tokyo Electric Power Company of teleconferences between the Tokyo headquarters of the stricken Fukushima nuclear power plant and plant’s managers in early days of 2011 accident offer firsthand account of the last-ditch and unsuccessful attempts to avert multiple meltdowns.
lead_paragraph: The split-screen videos show executives from the Tokyo Electric Power Company, or Tepco, huddled around a conference table, trying to grasp or organize the situation.

headline.seo: Tepco Shows Video From Japan’s Nuclear Crisis
headline.main: Japan Utility Shows Recordings of Nuclear Crisis
headline.print_headline: Japan Utility Shows Recordings of Nuclear Crisis
